name: City Jumper 2
description:
City Jumper II is the sequel to one of the most popular web games of all-time.

Your mission is to jump over famous New York landmarks while avoiding the treacherous obstacles that stand between you and victory. Warning...this is a highly addictive game!

Features:

- 120 highly addictive, challenging levels

- Spring loaded launchers propel stickman over obstacles

- Continue game feature allows the action to continue
